targets.expr: count(sum (kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)  / count(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)  == 1 )
count(kube_pod_created{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"})
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"})
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}))

pql step=1h sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"})) by (pod)
| rename value as cpu_usage
| fields pod, cpu_usage

pql step=1h sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"})  by(pod)
| rename value as mem_used
| fields pod, mem_used

pql step=1h kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"} == 1
| fields pod, phase

pql step=1h sum (kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)  /  count(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)  == 1 
| rename value as readiness
| fields pod,  readiness

sum(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)  /  count(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)

panels.description:
Каждая красная линия это смерть контейнера. 
Обычно после этого идет перезапуск конейнера, но не всегда

targets.expr:
pql kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{reason!~"Completed", group=~"k8s",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*",env="$env"} > 0
  and 
  on(container, pod) increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{group=~"k8s",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*",env="$env"}[30s]) > 0
| timechart latest(value) by pod, reason

panels.title: Pod Termination Reasons

targets.expr:
pql sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}[1m])) by (pod)
| timechart limit=0 sum(value) by pod

pql sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod)
| timechart limit=0  mean(value) as requested

pql sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)
| timechart limit=0  mean(value) as limits

pql rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*",env="$env"})
| timechart limit=0 sum(value) by pod

100 * sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{env="$env",namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*"}[5m])) by (pod, container) / sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{env="$env",namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

pql  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}) by (pod) 
| timechart limit=0 sum(value) by pod

pql sum by(pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env", resource="memory"})
| timechart  mean(value) as requested

pql sum by(pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env", resource="memory"})
| timechart  mean(value) as limit

pql sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}[5s])) 
| eval legend =  "RX: " + pod
| timechart  sum(value) by legend

pql  (sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"(ds-|m1-)*($application).*", env="$env"}[5s]))) * -1
| eval legend =  "TX: " + pod
| timechart  sum(value) by legend

((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) / (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} )) * 100

((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) / (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"} )) * 100
avg(node_load1{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) /  count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) by (cpu)) * 100
avg(node_load1{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) /  count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node_exporter", k8scluster="$env"}) by (cpu)) * 100

pql sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{env="$env", instance="$node"})) by (pod) 
| stats last(value) by pod

pql sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{env="$env", instance="$node"})) by (pod) 
| stats last(value) by pod

group='{ //todo replace }' or group="{ //todo replace }" system="istio-ingress"  env="$env" upstream_cluster:".*$application.*{ //todo replace }.*"
| eval legend =  response_flags + " " + status + " " + vhost
| timechart span=10s   count by legend

pql histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_time_bucket{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~".*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m])) by (le, cluster_name))
| eval legend = "p99 " + cluster_name 
| timechart  max(value) by legend

pql histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_time_bucket{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~".*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m])) by (le, cluster_name))
| eval legend = "p95 " + cluster_name 
| timechart  max(value) by legend

pql histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_time_bucket{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~".*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m])) by (le, cluster_name))
| eval legend = "p50 " + cluster_name 
| timechart  max(value) by legend

pql step=10s sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~".*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m])) by (cluster_name, response_code_class)
| eval legend = response_code_class + " " + cluster_name
| timechart  span=10s  max(value) by legend

pql step=10s sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_rx_bytes_total{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~"outbound\\|.*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m]) ) by (cluster_name) != 0
| eval legend = "RX " + cluster_name
| timechart  span=10s  max(value) by legend

pql step=10s sum(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_tx_bytes_total{k8scluster!="",env="$env",cluster_name=~"outbound\\|.*($application).*{ //todo replace }.*"}[1m]) ) by (cluster_name)* -1
| eval legend = "TX " + cluster_name
| timechart  span=10s  max(value) by legend

group="{ //todo replace }" or group="{ //todo replace }" system="$namespace" kubernetes.pod.name:".*$application.*" env="$env"
| timechart count by level

group="{ //todo replace }" or group="{ //todo replace }" system="$namespace" kubernetes.pod.name:".*$application.*" env="$env" 
| timechart   count as Messages
